newsArray.title: Rohit Sharma becomes second Indian cricketer to join elite T20 list
newsArray.description: Mumbai Indians batter Rohit Sharma completed 12,000 runs in T20 cricket. He became the second Indian after Virat Kohli to hold the record. He has scored 4231 runs in T20Is, and the rest of the runs were scored in the IPL and the Champions League.

newsArray.title: Bumrah hits 300! Where does it rank among T20 wicket-takers?
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: Jasprit Bumrah achieved a significant milestone, claiming his 300th T20 wicket during Mumbai Indians' IPL match against Sunrisers Hyderabad. He dismissed Heinrich Klaasen to reach the landmark, while Trent Boult starred with a four-wicket haul. The match was played with both teams wearing black armbands to pay respect to the victims of the Pahalgam terror attack.

creator: VV Subrahmanyam
newsArray.description: At one point, Sunrisers were 35 for five in 8.3 overs, but Heinrich Klaasen's brilliant knock of 71 helps Hyderabad fight back

newsArray.title: 61760 રન અને 199 સદી... ક્રિકેટ ઇતિહાસમાં બન્યો મહારેકોર્ડ, જેને તોડવો અશક્ય
newsArray.description: ક્રિકેટની દુનિયામાં રોજ નવા રેકોર્ડ બને છે અને તૂટે છે. કેટલાક રેકોર્ડ તૂટતા હોય છે, જ્યારે કેટલાક એવા રેકોર્ડ છે જેને તોડવા વિશે વિચારવું પણ અઘરું છે. એવો જ એક કીર્તિમાન ઇંગ્લેન્ડના ભૂતપૂર્વ ક્રિકેટર જેક હોબ્સે બનાવ્યો છે.
newsArray.sentiment: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.sentiment_stats: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS
newsArray.ai_tag: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: IPL: Axar’s captaincy, a pleasant surprise
newsArray.description: With six more matches to go, the 31-year-old will be tested further but he could indeed become DC’s missing puzzle piece.
